entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:49 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
